key_findings: All files follow industry_analysis_template.md specification exactly
Consistent use of confidence scoring (X.X/10.0 format) throughout documents
Proper decimal risk probability format (0.0-1.0) maintained across all risk matrices
Investment recommendation summary integration consistent across industries
Professional presentation standards maintained with institutional formatting
Strong logical progression from industry discovery through analysis to investment conclusion
Investment recommendations properly aligned with analytical evidence and risk assessments
Confidence scores appropriately reflect data quality and validation thoroughness
Risk-adjusted return calculations consistent across different industry risk profiles
Economic context integration coherent with FRED indicators and policy implications
A-F grading system implemented consistently with clear evidence backing
Competitive landscape grades properly reflect market concentration and barriers
Innovation leadership grades align with R&D intensity and patent productivity data
Value chain efficiency grades supported by margin analysis and monetization metrics
Industry-specific characteristics appropriately reflected in grade differentials
Moat strength ratings (0-10 scale) consistently applied with durability assessments
Network effects, data advantages, and platform ecosystems properly quantified
Competitive positioning analysis reflects current market dynamics accurately
Regulatory environment considerations appropriately integrated into competitive analysis
Industry-specific competitive factors well-documented with supporting evidence
Interest rate sensitivity analysis present but FRED data unavailable for validation
Economic cycle correlation analysis appropriate for each industry's characteristics
Policy implications properly considered with regulatory and monetary policy context
Fed policy framework integration consistent across industries with varying sensitivity
Economic stress testing scenarios reflect realistic probability distributions

Growth catalyst probability weighting appropriate for technology adoption and market expansion timelines
